I mean cmon its Chili's.  After waiting for an extra Ziosk my kids were pleasantly entertained. As a mom i swear those things are worth every penny!!!  Overall i was very disappointed with the slow service. We were there nearly 2 hours and didnt even get desserts or coffee after. Just simply took forever.
Worst steak I ever had. Salad is like standing outside for the whole day. Ordered medium rare and served medium well. Never go there again.

Loved the bonus check-in offer. Chips and queso, seriously great deal, do it. We haven't been to a more "mainstream" restaurant in a while, prefer more mom/pop local shops but tonight the husband suggested Chili's. Service was pretty good, they were busy and it took some time to receive our check at the end of the meal, but no big deal. Food for me was just ok. I tried the "fancy" tacos and although there was a lot there quantity-wise, it just lacked in the right mix of flavors for me. I probably ate half of each of the three tacos. Everyone else seemed to think their food was ok, but my husband is the only one who finished their plate...maybe the chips and queso filled us up?...hmmm. We had a decent experience but I don't think I will feel the urge to be back anytime soon.
Food and service was absolutely awesome! I couldn't decide what to eat, so you know we will be coming back again. Our server, Theresa was super friendly and made it a great dining experience!
This location always satisfies my family and I. We order to go more often than dining in. Tracy @ the Bar- you're freakin awesome!!!!
Chili's is always a favorite place to go and now with the ziosk it keeps the kids entertained and way easy to pay

I don't really come to this chili location due to me not living or coming to this area a lot. This is was actually me and my boyfriends first time at this location & I have got to say our server made it awesome.  First off , we came here on Saturday and when we got here it was pretty busy. Yet Theresa/Teresa was so happy & made the vibe positive. She had such a great attitude.  Food wise , I ordered one of my usuals & by far mililani location gave me the most portions I've gotten compared to waikele & pearlridge. My bowl was full rather than half way full.  I recommend people to come here, not a long wait, great customer service (I recommend Theresa/Teresa as your server) , great food & overall just a great time.
Jess makes the best table side-bacon guacamole. And she's the friendliest server. Mahalo
Come here quite often with whole family. Cheese fries are awesome and the quesadillas are legit (for being on Hawaii). Great service and people!

I've been coming here since I was in elementary school, Me and my family would come after events or just to simply to eat lunch. I live in Wahiawa , so its more convenient to go there. The food and service are really good, including this Sunday when I went and had really enthusiastic waitress which made the service enjoyable. I recommend this establishment. I recommend this establishment because the food is good. I tried about everything on the menu, but I like the dessert more, the two favorite desserts I like is Oreo topped  molten cake and Skillet Toffee Fudge Brownie. The Oreo topped molten cake is A really good white color  cake, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, oreo cookie pieces and drizzle of chocolate fudge. The Skillet Toffee Fudge Brownie has delicious brownie with ice cream, caramel drizzle, and toffee pieces. All the food is a must have if you come just don't forget the dessert before you leave. Overall come and eat and try anything on the menu, the food is cooked good and taste really good. The servers are awesome and makes you want to be there. so come and try you won't regret.

Alright everytime we come here I forget to write a review or check in..Chili's is a regular for us n im kind of disappointed that I have very few check ins. Anyways, this time around we went in around 8-830pm almost closing shift. We were seated about 10mins after checking in. The place is under renovations so it smelt like paint n the layout is a little different with only booth tables running along the walls, it seems more open now.  Like always we started off with the endless salsa n chips, they had a special for the day only for $.21 yups u read that correctly $.21, who can go wrong with that. I ordered the wings over buffalo with side order rice n corn on a cob. My fiancé ordered the ancho salmon chicken. Let me just the chicken wings never fail:)). What got me was the corn n rice. First off the corn was once again SOGGY n u could tell it was sitting in the pot of water ALL DAY! The rice on the other hand was HARD n MUSHY..There was no in between :((...My fiancé or almost ALWAYS orders the the rib eye but decided to try something different. He had the ancho salmon. He enjoyed the salmon for it was cooked just right. He didnt care for the topping on the salmon as he stated it wasnt his flavor, hehe. The chicken was a little on the dry side, but we didnt complain as it was already almost close of shift. Our waitress whom I forgot her name was great. She was friendly n made sure our drinks were filled n we were doing alrite. I wish I had her name:(.  Over all it got 4 stars because of the soggy corn n hard/mushy rice...

Worst service on the island!! We walk in to three host with their backs to us and stand there for a good two minutes before they acknowledge us. Then give us attitude like we were disturbing them. We get seated and I use the restroom and come back to my husband who had yet to be waited on. Maybe it's the main land mentality or working in a restaurant but this place sucks and really needs to retrain their staff. They got a beautiful face life. It's time to do so on your staff!

I love chili's grew up in Houston going to chili's once a week and when I got older and moved to California I always went to Chili's maybe not as often but always loved it, when we arrived on Hawaii we decide to go out for dinner one of the first nights here when I saw chili's wasn't too far from Schofield we decided to go we were excited only to be disappointed, the wait was ridiculous! I've waited quite a bit in other chili's but this one took the price once we were able to get a table it took forever to order and the food was just ok the service was not the best it was truly a disappointment

I'm only writing this review because the service here is super fast for take out and awesome. They told us our order would take 30 minutes because they were slammed but it only took 15 and the to-go girl was very friendly. Good job Chili's

Had a great dinner with the love of my life :):). Ordered chips and salsa, Santa Fe Chicken salad and a Fajita trio. The food was great and the service. Amber our waitress did an awesome job and made our dinner even better!  Thanks Amber!!

I actually love this place because of Tracy and the crew that works with her. I really don't care for anyone else but to be fair I give this place five stars because I love the local feel with the other bartenders like Kevin.
Great lunch time spot! Tiffany was an awesome server. She went over and beyond to meet all our needs.  I'll defiently be back!

Chilis is always packed for their dinner rush so I would recommend coming before 530-6 if you're starving. The last time we came here I sat by the bar because we weren't too hungry and really only wanted the seasonal watermelon margaritas. I instantly got turned off by how unsanitary it was. The bartender was touching all kinds of rags and dishes and making drinks without washing his hands. It was gross
Called for call ahead seating and was told no problem, there will be no wait at all. Got here and now they are telling me 25 minutes. We would have gone somewhere else had I known about the wait.

Service was terrible. It was 9:00 pm and we weren't seated for 7-8 minutes. My party was the only group in the dining area and we still didn't get the attention of the waitress. Drinks came out late and wasn't refilled until we asked multiple times. Crew was cleaning up the restaurant before closing and we weren't getting the right attention. One of my friends ordered mash potatoes and it didn't come out! Probably never coming to this location again. My other friend also ordered a takeout drink and was not received.

My family and I are new to the island and went to this Chili's on Christmas Eve. Our server Michelle C. was so accommodating and sweet and helpful, and we will absolutely be back to that Chili's. Not all Chili's experiences are great, but we were pleasantly surprised. Michelle C. obviously knows what being a great server means!

If it weren't for the kind manager and the other server I would have given this place 2 stars for just their food because the service was horrible. Our server tonight was Jeny and she was pleasant when she came over, but she ignored us the whole time we ate. Anytime we would ask her for anything she would say she would come back but she never returned. Our time would have been ruined if it weren't for the people mentioned above. There was an urge to leave her no tip but I just can't do it and ended up giving her 15%. However my friend was very upset and left her a lot less. I did feel bad for her, but we tip on service and we didn't feel that we had gotten any. We kept thinking perhaps she didn't like us? Maybe we're too local and not military and that's why? I thought we were nice and we were forgiving until we had to ask for the same thing 3x and still didn't get it.  As for the food, it was good. I had the prime rib burrito. I normally get the shrimp tacos so it was nice to try something different. I doubt my friend will want to come back here again which is too bad because we use to come monthly.
Good customer service. Food came out pretty quick. Our server Darius was super friendly and didn't even need to write down our orders for a table of 5.
We love Chilis and the food was on point! thanks Kevin for the great service! Friendly staff! Will be back!
Thanks Darius for the awesome service! Everything was great. Everything. Food never disappoints!

Exactly what you expect from a Chili's, which is a good thing. The touch screens are pretty cool too. The food is tasty, the alcohol is reasonably priced, and the wait staff is friendly. I'd recommend it if you're in the area, but it's not worth the trip from downtown.
This was the best experience I had at Chilies. Great service and wonderful waitress name Andrea. She always put a smile on her face. Also wonderful food!
Great happy hour prices, options of food, and best chips and salsa. I love the atmosphere, customer service is great, and options for paying is convenient too.

JENNY is the best hostess!  She took the time out to let us try the various iced teas Chilis has to offer.  She also makes the best Mango Iced Tea.  She took very very good care of us.  Our desserts were exceptional, we had the cookie with ice cream and the Oreo.  She was attentive to my children and even after the meal was done and the tab paid, Jenny took care of us until we had left. Will definitely be asking for her again!

Eh, it's you're typical Chili's.  Food is hit or miss, service is hit or miss.  It really depends on what day it is.  I've had amazing waitresses and horrid ones.  I've had super fresh food with quick service and I've Waited forever and gotten cold food.  I definitely prefer the to-go options.  This place is always and forever packed.
Love this Chili's the most! Great Staff, always get great food and the interior is a brand new look too!

I have really grown to appreciate some chain restaurants. I like a local taste, but I also really like to know what I am I taking, and you are guaranteed this with Chilis. Before I went for a hail and farewell luncheon, my husband and I wanted to get an idea of what the menu had to offer. Not only did the menu break down the macronutrients, they gave individual numbers for sides and items you may omit.     There are also great menu choices for those who are gluten and calorie restricting. I had a great chicken and vegetables plate, and was able to stay significantly low on fat, while enjoying some butter and a lot of protein.      The bar offers appetizer deals for work hour dining, and weekend deals are always present. I'm not sure exactly what they are, but the website is always up to date. The prices of straight up alcohol were reasonable to average.     All in all, we had great lunch for an average price. Great for a large party.
My server Teresa was really nice and full of energy. I never had to wait for my drink to get refilled she was on top of it. My food was nice and hot and promptly brought out soon after I ordered

Horrible service one employee in to Togo section said to me "can I help you and I said sure I would like to place an order she picked up her cell phone and said I'm not the girl who does that so......" and then turns around and walks away. I left and have yet to return.

Came to this location today for lunch with my mom. (12pm) Our server Jess was so nice & friendly; she did such an awesome job taking care of us (she was actively bar tending as well). I had steak on asparagus with rice & tomato, & my mom had a ranch chicken sandwich with French fries. Both were cooked just right & came to us in a good amount of time. I really liked their new spring menu, lots of different choices! I'll be coming back to this location again soon.

Waited more then 10 mins for waters, more then 20 mins to order drinks. Our waiter gave poor service, and consistently talked to his coworkers. When another waitress heard us talking and complaining about the service she picked up the slack.

Free chips and queso for checking in...that made my day! Our server was so excellent...very attentive even though it was super busy. Great food! Chilis has really stepped it up since I've been here last! Thank you Chilis!

Review #2 - April 2016 Today we returned for another dine in experience. Jenny was a wonderful server! So personable and didn't make us feel like another number. Our chips and queso didn't come out right away, but she kept us informed and let us know that a fresh batch was being prepared - which we appreciated. Our meal was delicious and prepared perfectly. Will definitely return.  Review #1 - February 2016 The quickest service! Darius was an awesome server! He was so polite and professional. We received our food and drinks promptly. He brought our toddler his meal before everyone else at the table, which was much appreciated. Bravo!

Worst customer service by far. I prefer the one in Waikele. I've gone to this location 3 times. The first, my husband and I got food poisoning. The second, we came in only for dessert and wait 2 hours! Last time I went was 2 days ago with a friend where the waitress was rude and quite obviously hated her job. I will never return to this location. Stay healthy and enjoy your meal at any of the other locations!
I still love chili's. But, when are you bringing back the country fried steak and mashed potatoes???
The rice had hard dry clumps on two separate visits.  I give up.

I only go to two places for margaritas and Chili's is one of them. Their Presidente Margaritas are the best! And if you come for Happy Hour from 4-6pm M-F, the Margaritas, Appetizers & 23oz. draft beers are $2.00 off!  What a deal! I was also pleasantly surprised that you receive a free Chips & Queso with a check in with Yelp. Unfortunately, the Queso has beef but luckily it also comes with salsa so all is good!  They also show the latest sports games on a big screen TV right at the foot of the bar. And with their latest renovation, you can charge your cell phone at the bar with your cord into their built in USB port. So if you're looking for cheap drinks, cheap appetizers and the latest sports games, without having to worry about a dead cell phone ('cause you know we all do!), look no further than Chili's at Happy Hour!
Great place to eat. My friends and I come here to Mililani Chili's every now and then. I want to Thank Chili's for the Free Appetizers. That's a Awesome Idea!

Service and Location:  I went to Chili's yesterday with my boyfriend. The location is very convenient since it's located at the Mililani Town Center where there's plenty of parking.  The service was excellent. We went there around 5:30 pm and was told to expect a 10-15 minute wait, but we got in earlier since we didn't mind sitting on the bar side. It was packed on the restaurant side though.  Food:  "Entrees" My boyfriend got some burger with french fries while I got  the "Make it a Combo" option for $24.99/$25 which allowed me to get 2 entrees a side of broccoli and mashed potato skillet. Since I'm trying to lose weight, I opted out for the citrus-chile rice instead of the mashed potato skillet. For my 2 entrees I got Seared Shrimp and Ancho Salmon.  The seared shrimp was a little spicy on the mild side. It was perfectly cooked, but the spices-paprika and chile was kind of overpowering for my taste. The citrus-chile rice had little taste, but complimented the spices from the Seared Shrimp and Ancho Salmon.  The Ancho Salmon was my favorite in terms of flavor and seasoning profile. The salmon breast was perfectly cooked and had a moist inside, but crunchy exterior. The salmon was seasoned with chile and then drizzled with a spicy citrus-chile sauce topped with chopped cilantro and queso fresco. The cilantro and queso fresco helped break through the spiciness of the salmon which was nice.  My boyfriend gave me some of his french fries and they were kind of thick. It was seasoned with pepper but lacked salt. However when paired with ketchup, it complimented well with each other.  "Dessert"  For dessert, my boyfriend and I got their cheesecake for ($7-$8) which was drizzled with a strawberry puree. The cheesecake slice was pretty thick and had a graham crust. It tasted decent with the strawberry puree, but I felt like it was average to me.   Would I go here again?  Yes, I really like the Ancho Salmon and would get it again (minus the shrimp). I really feel like $19 is kind of pricey for Salmon, citrus-chile rice, and broccoli, but the salmon flavor profile was definitely worth it. Plus the dish is only 590 calories according to their menu.

Waited a minute to be greeted by someone who wasn't our server but Kiana stepped in and saved the day. Her promptness and attentiveness really save our visit. She's awesome, with a positive attitude and bubbly personality, she is definitely worth returning for.
Chili's in mililani is our favorite spot. We love to have Josie as our server. Perfect place to go to stop and have a burger or a drink!

We usually go to the Mililani Chili's 2 times a month and have great service and good food.  During our last dinner on June 1, 2016 our service was terrible!  Our waitress Alika was so bad, that she should not even be there.  We ordered chips and salsa with a side of ranch dressing, water with lemons, soda, ice tea and a margarita.  The first round of drinks took a while to get to us and she did not bring the lemons.  We received the chips and salsa with no ranch dressing (chips were soggy!).  When our dinner order came we had refills on the drinks and everyone got theirs except the ice tea.  We asked her where is the ice tea and she said they were out and brewing more, but then we saw the table next to us get there tea, so we asked someone else and we got the tea.  I then asked for chop sticks with my dinner and I was waiting about 5 min and she never came back, so I asked another waitress.  When I saw Alika and asked about the chopsticks, she said they were all out.  As soon as she walked away, the other waitress brought us 5 chopsticks and the Ice tea.  Alika flat out lied to our faces, and that just pissed me off.  Ask for another waitress if you are seated in her section.

Perfect for families.  Bring my  family of 5 here often 3 kids 2 - 8 yr and 1 under one! Not to crowded and always pleased with  the food and ambiance  of this miliani location within the last 6 months a good change and upgrade ive  seen! Service has been good! Check email for coupons makes it more convient and cheaper for bigger families  to enjoy a nice meal without the crazy price!

This has been our favorite meeting place for my friends and I to get together for lunch. We love the Presidente Margaritas! Yum! Carribean Salad topped with Chicken  or Shrimp both our favorites.  We always order extra avocado.  Salad is very refreshing , light, and delicious!  Chicken very moist and tender. Service with a smile and always attentative. Nice quiet cozy booths.

Just want to thank our awesome server Josie. She made me my special entree! Was also surprised that she remembered me from the last time we came, (which was months ago). Service was awesome! Will definately come back! Again thank you Josie!

They have the best margaritas! My friends and I went for ladies night and the food was great, service from the hostesses were less than par! There was plenty of outdoor seating like we had asked for and got told they were "waiting" on a big party. 45 minutes later no party, so we got seated. We had a new waiter who was doing a fab job.

I'm not sure what the hell happened to the service this evening (6/30 @ 1900-2100), but it was slow AF!!! Our stay at the restaurant took around two hours because of the slow service. Well, perhaps slow doesn't best describe our experience tonight. It was more like an "absence" of service. We had to go inside the restaurant and get our own utensils and napkins. Being seated outside, I noticed that with the other tables as well--the lack of service. There were more than a few pissed patrons this evening who experienced the same. I'd like to see management address this service neglect for the outside seating.  Though this was my main complaint, that wasn't the only thing that went wrong this evening. Our food came out 45 minutes after we ordered, the waitress got our order incorrect twice, and our eating utensils weren't as clean as they should be (i.e., one fork had leftover food stuck between the prongs and the dessert spoons were coated with some sort of filmy substance).  I'm very disappointed in my family's dining experience this evening.  I will be calling the restaurant tomorrow, hoping to speak of these issues.
Chili's food is chili's food. Josie our server however spectacular.  She gets the 5 stars !!

Loved our waitress and the food! Endless chips and salsa were only $2.99 because it was happy hour! I got the big mouth burgers and molten cake! Both were amazing! Also loved the games you can play on the tablet while your waiting and you can pay with the tablet which is super fast!!
Our server Brenden was awesome, food was great and price was good. Will come here again especially for the service. Highly recommend it to everyone.

I usually come to Chilis once a month but this time my experience was awesome! Our waitress Josie took great care of us and was on top of her game. I was didn't have to look for her for something because she was always there ready to see what we needed. She is awesome and my food came out quick and perfect! Service is defiantly everything and she made sure it was perfect

Theresa is still the best server at this location! Always super friendly and welcoming. The fact that she remembers us is impressive and it's always a bummer if we don't have her. Tonight it was extremely busy and packed and the service definitely slower than normal but our waitress Omi was so kind and apologetic. Customer service like that makes less than ideal circumstances much better and pleasant.

Another great experience at Mililani Chili's.  My honey and I were in dire need for some adult beverages and I remembered that I had a $25 gift card.  Round 1 of drinks....freezie! We visited on a Thursday night around 7:00 PM and surprising there was only a five minute wait.  Our server greeted us quickly and helped me decide on what I was going to eat.  Apparently I haven't been to Chili's in forever because I didn't know they had burritos now!  I ordered the Smothered Carnitas Burrito and that thing was humongous.  I got about halfway through before I tapped out and decided to eat the second half for lunch the next day.   Be sure to check in on yelp for a free order of chips and queso!  Man, gift card, free appetizer and a mondo burrito....happy girl!

Always a great option whether it be a casual lunch with a friend or a large dinner party. I appreciate that I always receive my food promptly & the service is great! Favorites are the shrimp tacos and Caribbean salad, and of course you must save room for molten cake! They often change up the dessert menu with different limited edition desserts, which I am always excited to try, and never disappointed.
Josie is awesome, fantastic, very hard working happy server at the Mililani location. Great recomadations off the menu, would definitely dine here again!  Thanks Josie The three movie people..
Love this restaurant and feel of the place. Pricey so we come when we can treat ourselves.

Food is consistently good but the service is hit or miss. They do make up for when they get things wrong like forgetting to put in your order and are usually always courteous. It's not terrible for being a large chain restaurant. I would return despite the hiccups.
Good food and kid friendly.  Wait staff is average but we like to bring our son because he can play on the ziosk and we can have adult conversation.
Food is consistantly good. Service is usually good as well. The queso is in testing because it is brown but it is yummy.

We visited this location after being told we had to leave another restaurant in the area because I did not have my I.D. with me (I wasn't trying to order a drink, just food, and I'm also pregnant so I couldn't drink even if I wanted to). We were sat right away, had a friendly and professional server, and were even able to enjoy a free chips and queso by checking into the location. The food was very good, I split the Cajun Alfredo with my brother, and they had already split the order into two plates when they brought the food out. Good location, good staff, and good food. Would definitely visit again.
I love comming to this chillis, service is quick and attentive and they always have everything in the menu. Yes lots of things aren't fresh but the taste it's ok

I seem to be here at least once a year after open house. A bunch of us from work go to have a few drinks and pupus since it's such a long day.  It's a great time to just relax and have fun. On this last outing, Josie was our server. This 5 star review is based on her service. She was great!!! Such an outgoing and fun personality. For having a table of ten people and a few other tables, she was attentive and took great care of us.  So....if you are ever in Mililani and going to chilis...see Josie!!!
Been here 3 times now. Always a friendly wait staff and the food is decent for a large chain restaurant. Will continue to come here.

We had the triple dipper which is one of our usual "entrees" and our awesome waitress Josie suggested the mango chili chicken. Both were delicious and the waitress was super nice and awesome. Also free queso!!!
Josie was a great server! Environment is nice and great place to bring friends when hour trying to avoid the traffic downtown.
I prefer Chili's for a place to go and enjoy the food and atmospere.  I also pefer Josie. She is one of the best waitress there. She is on top everything always makes sure your glass is full.

I had a great experience here this evening.  I sat at the bar and Josie was our bartender.   She was so attentive and she split my salad into two plates without me asking.  I just said I would share it with my friend and she took care of the rest.  The margarita she made for me was amazing!  Go see Josie at the bar!  She closes most Sunday nights she said.    My salad, buffalo chicken salad was great tasting as well!  I will definitely be back to see Josie!  Thanks for a great experience!

Mi Amore was our waitress again, I remember her from our previous visit many months ago.  She has the most contagious smile, and such a cheerful personality, yet very professional.    She tends to our table just enough that she isn't being too disruptive.  Mi Amore has to be my favorite waitress. My son got the cheddar bites, which came with a dipping sauce served in a deep basket, he mentioned it tasted more like mozzarella sticks than cheddar, and ate half of it, which was a large amount.  Mister got the loaded potato soup in a cup, which he enjoyed.  I was hungry for dessert, and got my favorite chocolate molten cake (which I split with mister).  The chocolate molten cake is served with vanilla ice cream and is basically a spongy like chocolate cake drizzled with chocolate sauce.  Although we split the cake, we still couldn't eat all of it.
Josie was amazing and very friendly. Got seated very quickly. Appetizers came out Quick as well. Good place to go as always.

Chili's has multiple locations around the island. This location is no different from the others.  Some changes if you haven't been there in a while: - They have done away with the coloring menu for kids and have replaced the coloring with a tablet with games - new menu items! Constantly changing items keeps you wanting to try more stuff.  - there is a yelp check in for free queso and chips!!  Use it! Chili's is a consistently good place for all occasions. This used to be my kids' favorite place because they love the special drinks they can ord3r with the kids menu. They are now too old for that.  Customer service: customer service is pretty good. They take reservations for parties over 10 and even so, I don't remember waiting for more than 30 minutes for a table. The last time we went, our waitress checked on us a lot and came to refilled our waters. The only b time there was a gap was because staff were singing happy birthday to a nearby party.  I got to give them credit because they put up with all my customizations. I'm sure they wish I'd just ask for a regular item lol. This dinner went very well. Don't forget to check in when you get there. Free chips and queso. Chips were so good. I had a half rack honey which was perfect for me. And the other half had a bacon burger with grass fed beef. And to end it always with the chocolate molten lava. We ate everything. Haha.  Dinner 8pm For 2 $48

Shannon was our server she was soooo nice and checked up on us a lot to make sure we were okay. She was very attentive. The food was great and my steak was cooked perfect definitely recommend this chiles over the waikele one.

I'm bias I hate chilis I've had tasted everything from the menu and so far had found nothing I liked   This one in particular some of the dishes were quite bland and tasteless not worth the money in my opinion

Loss of business because the chilis app does not work with this location. The app also has the wrong number posted so I could not order to go and just pick up. I elected to go to another stop for dinner to avoid the hassle.

Just wanna say that Jess is the best bartender ever. She's super fun and just knows how to make a conversation. Jess made sure that our visit here was memorable and makes me Wanna come back with her fun and bubbly personality. 10 stars!! 100 stars!!! Our fist experience over a year ago was disappointing, but we went this past Veterans Day and the staff and food were fantastic. Complete 180 from the last time we visited. Good food and loved the queso dip

Theresa is the best server they have hands done! She is always smiling and happy which always puts us in a great mood. She is always checking to see if we need anything, our drinks are never more than half empty, and she is fast and attentive. I don't think I can really say enough about her. As for the food and restaurant in general one Chili's is the same as the next one here.

Thank you guys
Not the best food I've had and now they dont offer kids any crayons instead they have one tablet at the table and you have to pay to play games. Should have went to ruby tuesday instead

They also have this computer screen on the tables that allows you to order drinks, dessert, play games, check out their specials, and pay your check.  Overall very nice experience.
Ordered a Strawberry Lemonade and a bowl of loaded baked potato soup. I got my drink after 15 minutes, I was still waiting on my soup 48 minutes after asking for it 2 times during my wait.

It's a chain restaurant, which tend to be way over priced here on island. However, it's located right across the street from my work, so it's not an uncommon place to meet for lunch or happy hour. Make sure you sit at the bar or in the lounge if you want to enjoy happy hour prices btw. The lunch deals menu is good.
Chilis is my go to place when I wanna drink. Our waitress was super cheerful and full of energy. She did spill our water once but other than that she was great

5 stars for their patron margaritas! I got the strawberry one and it was sweet and sour and did the job!  We got the appetizer combo:  the deep fried pickles were pretty good but a little salty. The honey BBQ boneless wings were OK, a little too saucy. I really liked the sliders, that was my favorite of the three appetizers we tried. I would get it again.  I didn't see paradise pie on the dessert menu... did they take it off? Used to be my favorite dessert at Chili's. As far as chain restaurants go, Chili's is OK. It is really hit or miss and depends what you order. Waitress was very sweet!

Food took forever & they weren't even busy. We went there at 4:30 way before dinner time.  Food was okay at least it came out hot.  Won't be coming here again. Ruby Tuesday is so much better. Great service & yummy food. I should of just went there.  Update.. Chili's corporate contacted me & mailed me a $30 gift card to try the restaurant again. I'm back tonight.. hopefully dinner will be better..

Initially my husband and I intended to eat at Ruby Tuesday's. However, the wait time was so long that we decided to go to Chilis. I'm so glad we did. Our server tonight was Jewel. She was everything we could ask for. She made recommendations, she kept us informed on when our food was coming out. She continuously kept our mango iced tea full. She was such a joy and extremely pleasant. The Aloha spirit was definitely in Chilis tonight. Jewel represented the company extremely well and we will always come back and sit in her section. True aloha spirit. We live in Ewa Beach and we drive here pacifically to see her.

Service was great. They were super busy and only bad thing was our skillet queso was cold. Our waitress rocked!!!

Four stars because their food is good but their bathrooms are filthy. Went in to use the latrine and wash my hands and the entire floor by the head was covered in piss. Disgusting. Washed my hands and the only one garbage can was filled to the top.  Aside from that I got the guacamole burger and it was pretty good. I upgraded to onion rings from steak fries and they were okay nothing special.  Decent food at the end of the day from a long day at the beach. Very appreciative for the food. Just clean your bathrooms.

Worst service I've ever experienced.  While at work, a group of us placed a curbside order totaling $135.00 of food.  Unfortunately, we discovered three orders were not included with the order although we were charged.  When I called to speak the manager, he claimed it was our fault the order was incomplete and we should be thankful he took our order since it was close to closing.  Additionally, his grill was closed so he would not cook the missing items.  He would give me"Chilis coupons."  At 10:30pm at night, when very few restaurants are open, this was very, very unfortunate.  He was rude, unprofessional and assumed zero responsibility.  I will not return.  We usually order from this restaurant once a week, but not anymore.
Love their burger specials!  Went there for happy hour and got a beer that was nice & cold. Service staff was friendly and attentive.

Chili's Mililani is great! From appetizer to desert....me & my husband loved it all! & couldn't stop mentioning it to each other, honestly. Haven't frequented here much & just started coming recently. & now I can say, there's no turning back lol.
Love the Dry Rub Ribs and the Dr. Pepper BBQ Sauce.  Try It.

I'm so torn when it comes to Chili's... it's convenient and a favorite amongst friends because of their margaritas, but I'm never satisfied with the food here.  I've tried practically everything...appetizers, fish dishes, fajitas, even the newer Tex-Mex items, but nothing ever tasted good to me. Lots of processed proteins which makes everything way too salty! Even the chicken looks and tastes like those pre-packaged sodium injected pieces, and the shrimp are the tiny mushy ones that don't taste like anything. So sad! For the prices, I'd think they'd push for more quality products, but they just make up for it by dishing out huge portions!  Oh, and the guys agree that their burgers are pretty on point but last time my husband wanted a lettuce wrap instead of the bun and they said they ran out of whole lettuce. Instead they offered to serve the burger with shredded lettuce lol omg! I know I know, we are picky since our limited food options but sheesh, what restaurant runs out of lettuce? I jokingly offered to go next door to Times to get some but the waiter wasn't on board! :p  Anyway, I can go on and on about the disappointment of their food but I just tell myself to go there for drinks and all will be okay. *sigh*

We called a few days in advance looking for a place to accommodate a large group of 30 on a Saturday evening.  I was assured that it would be ok, and "not to worry."  When we arrived, we were seated quickly... only a few minute delay while they adjusted the wait staff to assist us.  From there it just got better.  EXCELLENT SERVICE,  quick, courteous and of course the food was all great!  Chris, Brendan, and Chase were all so attentive and made our evening absolutely Wonderful.

We LOVE coming here! Especially this location! We always sit at the bar when Kevin is working! He such an awesome person with great customer service & fast! We also enjoy all the meals we have ordered. Coming here during the week days while they got the lunch specials are great deals! We come here weekly... only when Kevin works. Lol

Since we were there for Happy Hour Hubby took advantage of the $2 off beer and $2 off appetizer.  We started off with the Margarita Flatbread which was crispy on the bottom and topped with lots of cheese.  Very flavorable!  And because I checked in with Yelp we also received a free Queso.  We barely touched our chips and Queso when our Flatbread Margarita came.  And soon after our dinner came!  Hubby ordered the 2 meat combo with Ribs and Cheddar and Jalapeño sausage.  He was in Heaven!  Said Ribs were better than Tony Romas!  My go to dish is always the Chicken Enchilada.  This did not disappoint.  So tasty! We had so many leftovers and Tiffany, being the excellent Server she is brought us enough containers to bring our food home.  And without us even asking even provided us container for the Queso and fresh salsa and chips to go.  After a very long week at work (and it's only Wednesday) we were really happy to have excellent service and food - Thanks Tiffany, you made our evening really enjoyable.  We will be back!

Wouldn't go back there anymore. They said, 30-40mins wait. We were right there, by the door where u check in, the girl should know us, or at least the name I gave her. 40mins later, I asked, and they said they called us already but we weren't there?!!! Ha? I didn't even hear my name, or was it pronounced correctly? Oh well, just had to wait another 10mins to get our table ready. Then I they cud greet my sister HBD, not the whole song, just greeting and their hooray thing and clapping, server said, ok, and free scoop of ice cream. We waited 30mins just for that ice cream, and dessert, and saw pur bill, they charged us for that bday desser! And, no one came for her greeting. So so bad. Totally not going. I feel like they judge u base on your ethnicity. At least it felt that way.

Nice restaurant for the most part.  Ask for a booth unless you're ok with rubbing elbows at a teeny tiny table.  You can pay with the machines at the tables without having to flag down your busy server

My office loves to eat here.  Everyone raves about the grass fed hamburgers here and get it everytime. For appetizers, we always get some kind of chips and dip.  Using our Yelp check in offer, we got a free "queso" dip which was really just some chili cheese dip.  I actually kind of hated it.  Others still ate it but it didn't compare to when we ordered the white queso and spinach dip.  The spinach dip was gone by the end of lunch while the "queso" dip was thrown away.  I will say that I love their tortilla chips though. I have had one of their chicken tex mex bowls and their chicken and shrimp fajitas.  My husband had the smokehouse ribs.  The mex bowl was pretty good.  Had good flavor and was of decent portion.  I would give it a 7/10.  I really enjoyed their fajitas.  It was a good amount of food and the flavor was good; a 8.5/10.  My husband really enjoyed the ribs.  I tasted it and thought it was decent, comparable to the refrigerated Tony Romas ribs you can buy from Costco. Also, you can get refillable soda, tea, and lemonade here.  Sweet! This place has decent food and a nice atmosphere, but it really isn't my favorite place to eat.  I think for the same amount of money, I could get a better quality and better tasting meal elsewhere.

My wife and I were craving a late night snack and decided to get the lava cake from Chilis. Was disappointed to find that they didn't even heat up the cake. Middle was frozen like it came straight out the freezer! Bummer

You know your experience and the food was gonna be Awesome when you have the Best Service!!! Thank You Audrey even though all our food (except dessert) had to be bagged food was delish and the service with the smile was even better

Me and my husband came in for dinner, got our free queso and chips. I ordered the fiery chicken strips and he got the loaded chicken wings, mango aonald palmers to drink, everything was delicious  Our server Theresa was great with service never had to hunt her down for refills. We will be back.

5 stars for the server who took care of my family and I. My husband asked to sit at a booth because table would be to hard for our 5,4,and 3 year old to keep in one place. At first the host was giving us a hard time because where we wanted to sit was no open with no server. We almost ate somewhere else because all they had to do was clean the table. But we finally sat and a server came in no time she had a red flower in her hair and make on fleek I must say. She was nice and attitude that she took care of us out side her section. She was amazing even though we took awhile with the menus. If management does look at this please tell her thank you so much and I hope she get recognized for her hard work. Also I think your Host need to be retrained on accommodating the customer request the best they can. We shouldn't have to fight with the host if we don't want to sit somewhere. Another family had the same problem and they looked at them dumb and said no. But gave in after the lady told her they can't fit. Please I hope that you guys can fix this issue.

Terrible service. It is 5:00 pm April 24 2017 I got seated and were told our waiter will be right with us. We've waited 45 mins sitting down with no one to service us or even offer water. This place is empty with no workers to be seen maybe they're all messing around in the back. My family and I are starving! We got up and left and decided to eat else where. IT TOOK SO LONG THAT OUR INFANT STARTED SCREAMING BLOODY MURDER. Never again. This place should be shut down and any workers on this shift should be fired. Waitresses walked right passed us giving us a smirk but never asked us if we have been helped nor do we at least want water.

A few years ago I would have recommend this location above any other on the island but, the experience has gone way down! The service is hit or miss and longer than normal wait times for food on most visits makes it frustrating.  If they returned the consistency they used to have I would give them 5 stars. Still a good place to eat but rowdy bar and patio customers, long waits on weekends, and inconsistent staff make it a Monday through Thursday place for us!

UPDATE: so after posting my review, manager James has contacted me via yelp explaining that it was a miscommunication (or lack of communication) at the time and has reimbursed my hubby and I via gift cards. Glad that the manager had taken time to properly address the situation. I'm willing to keep giving Mililani location a chance. Way to go James and thank you for reaching out to me!  Hubby decided to order take out Saturday night and all we wanted was a molten cake thing and some cheddar bites.  While the cheddar bites had no problems with it, I'm here to talk about the "molten chocolate cake"  First off, I'm pretty sure if something is molten isn't it supposed to be warm and melty? WRONG. Our "molten cake" had a FROZEN middle. -___- every time we come there's always something going on, if it's not one thing it's another. Pretty sure my Mililani chilis days are over

Chilis is the same everywhere you go and thats probably one of the main reasons I like coming here.  You know when you're hungry but don't know what you want to eat but you're stomach is like telling you to stop procrastinating and "Feed Me!"?  Well that's when Chilis comes in to my mind and I like that they have a to-go window so I can get my food and go without a long wait.  Parking can be kind of rough if you're trying to park in their lot but there's a lot of parking next door at the mall.  The grilled chicken sandwich with apple smoked bacon and barbecue sauce, the ribs, and of course the ceasar salad are all super yummy and my favorites!
Just grabbed a quick.. Lauren at the bar took good care of the group and got the food and drinks out quick!

Always exceptional service!! Both Mike and I a from Mililani so it always feels like home when we come here. This is our favorite Chili's, not because we're from Mililani but because the food is always great and the service is on point..  Chili's is a great family restaurant. They have an awesome menu for the keiki (kids) and pretty sweet HH and lunch specials!  It's mandatory to get the chips and salsa and with your checkin on Yelp you can get a FREE Queso and chips with bottomless chips and salsa! L O V E ! I'm addicted to their Quesadilla Explosion Salad, I order it without cheese in the salad. To me it just taste wayyy better! This salad is a perfect combination of so many different flavors! It's sweet, tangy, & spicy! You've got beans, corn, peppers, tortilla strips, moist chicken strips! It's just awesomely amazing! Mm mm mmmmm!! Each table comes with a kiosk which you can order off of, play games on (small fee, great for kids), search for deals, and pay your bill! Super cool!  If you ever have room for dessert indulge in the molten cake! B O M B !!!! Specials on different flavors change throughout the year. I never tried one I didn't like. It is huge and definitely shareable! Paradise pie was another fave of mine but they longer have it - boo! Jk! I still love CHILI'S

We go here about once a week, and really enjoy the place and especially the service. The food is pretty good, they have a decent selection of beer. The servers are excellent for the most part. Especially the bar staff. Keep up the great work!

On May 27th we came to eat here at Chillis in Mililani, The food was good and the awesome lady that served us was very much appreciated.     The young lady host that evening was something else.  -- You could've SMILED and greeted us warmly or told us something as we stood there kind of confused if we should sit and wait or whatever.  -- On our way out you were so busy eyeballing me for whatever reason I could careless about that you still didn't thank us for coming , or invite us back ,let alone SMILE for goodness graciousness. -- I hope you learn your job well and execute your customer service skills properly because it's just very distasteful in a very customer oriented setting. The hard working people around you shouldn't have to share their tips with you .

I enjoy eating at Chili's because it's laid back and there are plenty of options to snack on or for a meal. You can check in and get a free queso and chips which always come with salsa too. Don't save it because you can always get a new one with a new check in.  I'm in love with their Santa Fe chicken salad so when I saw a new item, chicken crisper Santa Fe salad, I had to get it! It was awesome! I already love the salad, I used to order the crispers in their triple dipper but combined: so good!! Our server was great too. Somewhat scatter brained but very polite and frequently checked up on us. Chili's is a great place for a quick sit down eat or cruise at the bar.
Great tableside guacamole and Chris our server was extremely great at his job. Service was exceptional.  Food was delicious and filling.

The first time me and my family came to this chilis we weren't so pleased ! We have a stroller and we asked to be seated out of the way ! And the lady then sat us in the middle of booths while other people was still being seated having us to move the stroller 3x ! Then another guy came up to us and told us that we needed to put the stroller off to the side while he seen my 2 month old sleeping in it ! We asked for our bill and left ! Told myself we would never eat here again ! The place is clean and nice they have music playing also ! It can get pretty loud inside ! Mostly family's and groups of military in the day  2nd visit to this location I came with my family again and they sat us immediately ! That was nice ! The food was great ! Server was nice as well !  3rd visit was wens June 28th 2017 and let me just say that the waitress TIFFANY was outstanding ! She was in the same zone and OUR waitress but helped us a bit more ! Where I can't even tell you her name because she didn't really check in with us to see if she was fine TIFFANY Helped us the most ! Although when receiving our food it was COLD we waited for 10 minutes before asking for another server to help ofcourse in that case it was TIFFANY , she quickly got our food situated and it took about 15 minutes which was nice :) although our original server didn't really help us we still have her a tip ! We also have TIFFANY a tip :) ! Thank you again to TIFFANY of Mililani chilis ! Best waitress hands down ! Such a great personality also friendly :) looking forward to your services again !  Today ! We walked in waited 30 minutes to sit due to the kitchen being backed up , the lady taking our order seemed like she was in a rush when there was NO one but us in the area ! She got our drinks and then our food squared away everything was so quick but waiting to sit !  In all situations I ordered the burger bites and French fries which is so yummy !!!! They also have these pickles in a certain sauce for all you pickle lovers it's a must try :) the chocolate molten lava cake is the reason we come to chilis :) !

location: Mililani Mauka - Launani Valley, Mililani, HI
review: They have good tunes and good service! Notice I was wet from the rain and gave me some napkins to dry off. My waitress Jessica was wonderful! She was helpful and timely!!! I hope she has a great birthday weekend too! She deserves it with the awesome job she did!

So I decided to come back and try this place one more time and omg I'm so glad I did. We had such an amazing server, Christopher mc. Well that's what it says on our receipt. Came here with my husband cause when we were in town by ala moana  he already knew he wanted the molten lava cake his favorite. Anyways we came in got seated right away, and I thought he told me his name was John, so I'll call him John. He came over introduced himself got us drinks. And gave us time to look over the menu. All the while he had maybe a party of 12-15 teenagers right next to us. You'll get why I told you this later. Anyways my husband likes the table side guacamole and was so happy that we ordered it. He added a lot of bacon and lime which my husband hasn't tried it that way before, and he ended up liking it. Came time to order our food, and then we both wanted to eat a salad and I told him about the chili I saw and we both thought on it for a while. We couldn't make up Our minds, John then came back and helped us, he even split our salad in two. So we could share. We both got, our chicken. I wanted grilled, and he wanted it Fried. The plates were so full. Ohh my god! And he was super friendly and fun. He went above and beyond for us. Even with that party that was next to us. Seemed like insanity cause they all got separate checks, but he kept his cool And made jokes with us or even just a casual conversation. It just made us both of us very happy:)  we'll be returning soon, thanks John or Christopher:)

Decided to eat here tonight with wife neither of us we're looking forward to the meal but I was looking forward to desert. After we entered we were greeted by a friendly host who promptly showed us to our table, it's the table that we met an amazing server who went above and beyond in customer service. I believe his name was Christopher but from the moment we sat at the table he was there to make our meal enjoyable. We weren't sure on what to eat so decided to split the dishes and only eat half... when the dishes came out he had got them split in the kitchen and plated up individually. I thought they were full portions the plates were so full! As I have dietary requirements of no dairy one of the chili bowls he brought out had some cheese on so without question he went and got another. Then on to desert... the Molten Chocolate Cake!! The best thing to get! Again he listened to how we wanted it and delivered it to us with a smile! Perfect meal and experience. We will definitely be returning in the future

I work across the street from the Mililani location.  Needless to say my husband and I eat lunch here probably more often than we should. The servers are always friendly and the food is always delicious. And the lunch prices are fairly reasonable.    Today my buffalo cauliflower wasn't cooked right twice in a row, but I had to leave to go back to work. So I went back after work to talk to the manager to let him know. He did great! Alex took responsibility for the mistake. Made me a fresh batch and personally oversaw the cook to make sure they were done right this time. He then compensated me by returning my money for the original purchase and giving me a gift card for the next time! The hostess offered me a drink while I waited for my order to be remade. All in all, great job guys!!
Haven't been to chilli's in a minute!! Sat at the bar and Jess was very helpful & fun~ thank you for pouring our drinks!! Definitely be back when I'm in town :)

Service was excellent! Jessie behind the bar was great! My beer was never empty and she was just very nice and on top of things. She kept checking up on us making sure all was good. Hard to find someone like her that can run the bar and still make time for a quick conversation . Definitely coming back! Thanks Jessie!!!

Chili's never disappoints me...   I don't come here as often as I used to...  but it's always a great experience.  Our server tonight, Theresa, was AWESOME!!!   Everything we ordered was good, especially the Oreo molten cake.

We came to Chilis after a long day.  We needed a drinks and food.  We sat down and immediately Theresa came to take our drink order.  She also offered to put my baby's food order in.  She was a great waitress and very patient and attentive to our needs. We will definitely come back to this Chilis for the food and service we received.
Came in tonight for an early dinner with my little one.  Chance was our server. He was awesome :) Very nice, always kept our drinks filled and food was on point. Try the smokehouse burger. Soo good!
Buffalo Fried Broccoli and Sizzling Fajita 3 combo was enough to satisfy our hunger. We had very efficient service and our server was spot on and very attentive to our needs. The food was very good!

location: Near East Side, San Antonio, TX
review: I was here for a military going away and the services sucks. I been here for over 2 hours and still didn't get a refill on my water. I order the honey  chipotle steak , After waiting 45 minutes for my food the asparagus was not cook all the way and the shrimp were cold. I am going to assume they were overwhelmed and that why the service was awfully.

So disappointed. Everything was cold. Fried pickles were drowning in oil and falling apart. I usually go to Waikele or Kapolei and theirs is great! Sent it back, came back worse.  Buffalo wings were cold and hard. My 6 year old even said his mac and cheese was cold. I mean if you guys are going to warm up your frozen food at least make sure it's hot.  Server was kind.  In a nutshell we will not be coming back.
Food was excellent. Service was excellent! Our waitress Jessie Jane was awesome  Wait time was mimimal! Great time atmosphere for family!
Always a good spot for family and friends. Nearby home and work. Best to go when you have time on your hands. Even to go is not a fast process but good always good

Theresa is THE BEST waitress I have ever come across hands down. Whenever I visit this Chili's, I always ask to sit in her section regardless of the wait time. She always remembers our drink orders and tonight she blew my mind by knowing exactly what we were going to order. My drink is never more than half empty when she brings me a fresh one. I would highly recommend this Chili's and Theresa as your waitress for your visit.
Standard Chilis restaurant... Great staff and good food. The restaurant has great ACs which is nice on hot Hawaiian days. The beer is always good here.

I love their salad and chips.  I can just sit there and have some salad and be pretty happy about that. I hadn't been to this Chili's in a long time.  We used to go often since they had a Caeser Salad with their All You Can Eat Soup and Salad.  They changed their menu, so Caeser Salad is no longer offered, but two other salad choices. Their Chicken Tortilla Soup and Baked Potato Soup is still available, which is delicious! Came in just for the free chips and salsa with the Yelp check in.  I wanted their lunch special, but that's not available on the weekends... Boo to that.  I decided on a Bacon Burger with fries.  The chips, salsa, and queso came quickly.  The burgers took awhile and it wasn't really that crowded.  That's ok though since the chips are unlimited.  The burger eventually came and it's was delicious and the fries were good as well, as long as it's hot. The service was pretty good and there wasn't much to complain about.  I don't go to Chili's often, but I haven't been disappointed with the quality of the food.  Sometimes the food takes awhile to come, but overall it's a pretty good dining experience.
Theresa is WONDERFUL! She is full of energy and full of jokes! I absolutely loved her as our waitress! She made our visit fun and interesting!  Please someone give her a raise! She's outstanding!

This Chilli's is typical for its brand. Nothing about it rewrites the book in terms of service ambience. So, if you are looking for a reliable place to eat this Chilli's is able to provide a familiar meal. If given the opportunity I will not object to going back.
Christine our server was excellent!  Great bubbly personality and knows her menu!  Will be asking to sit in her area when we come back again!  Thank you for a great dining experience!

Every time I come here and order a steak medium, it's like they just passed it over the flame barely.  It was even medium rare, it was like it was flash fried and still raw and cold inside.  I certainly didn't order the steak bleu! The cooks don't seem to understand how to cook steak.  I don't expect haut cuisine, but I do expect that they folks know how to cook a steak.   The wait staff and management tried to make it drift, but since this has happened numerous times, it seems to be a systemic problem with the cooking staff. I wouldn't come back here, but my son like the food.  Next time, I'll eat before we come here and just have a watered down, crappy margarita.

This location is my go-to for convenience and service.  I have been here over the years for several occasions including farewell luncheons, birthday celebrations and just because.  So far, I haven't had a bad experience.  I have tried several of their items and they are all delicious.  They're all packed with flavor, it's like a party in your mouth! Some of my favorites are: - Triple Dipper - Chips & Queso (plus salsa) - FYI Yelpers, check-in to Chili's and you get this for free! - Original Chicken Crispers - Quesedilla Explosion Salad - Smokehouse Combo - Old-timer with Cheese - Texas Dry Rub Baby Back Ribs - 1/2 Rack Their portions are huge.  Whenever I go here with my parents or my other half, we usually order our dishes and share; sharing is caring and what great way to sample different dishes! We always order the Chips & Queso as an appetizer (which again, is free when you check-in on Yelp), and that's always enough for us.  We never have room for any dessert, which is delicious too by the way, since we're full after eating the main dishes.   Be sure to save room for dessert if you can. Their Molten Chocolate Cake is delicious!

Chili's! Great to watch Football games there and the Chios and Salsa with a side of Corona  is the best! I always go to Mililani Chili's but I recently went to Kapolei Chili's and they were awesome also. Liked how the people who gathered there to watch the game were so into the game lol

Service was pretty good,  the waitress was pretty attentive.  Good portions,  not bad price. I have always loved the dry rub they have on the ribs,  and once again it did not disappoint.   Corn was a little soggy, although it did have fair amount of seasoning. May opt for different side next time,  though.
The food was ok steak over cooked mashed potatoes was old  Service sucked ads waited 20 mins to get a refill on my drink  Service during the evening to me is a lot better DO NOT GO DURING THE DAY
Jessie is the best server they have she is very nice and sweet. She is very quick and ensures her guest are very comfortable!
Best place to watch Thursday, Saturday and Sunday Football! Nice crowd, not too packed and service is quick!
Teresa is amazing !!!! She so energetic and fantastic . If anytime like to stop by for a good food and a great service come see Teresa at chili's Mililani location .
Quick service, and super friendly waiters. Food is always good; only complaint is waiting to get served when you sit down. Once the waiter shows up everything is smooth.
Always a great choice for a gathering with family and friends. The service is always top notch and the food is prepared great!

I've totally put off writing a review, so my experience was all the way back to the week of Father's day. Our server (I believe his name was Brenden) was a kind, friendly fellow who gave us both attention and space. As someone who has had quite a bit of serving experience, his service was excellent. It's a hard balance to be both professional and genuinely friendly and he did a great job. Food was delicious. My partner got ribs and he loved them. I can't quite remember what I got since it was so long ago, but it was lovely! We also got queso, which made my heart swell with joy. Good food and great service.

Cordial, friendly and prompt customer service from Hostess and Server.  Three Chicken Enchiladas caught my attention.  Enchiladas tasted yummy with crema.  An entree that is better left alone.  One mistake I made was accepting an option to pay for sour cream and guacamole and poured both condiments on all three enchiladas which resulted in a heavy taste and protruding belly.  I learned next time that less is best and goes a long way for this meal.  We sincerely appreciate that our server went above and beyond.  I will be more discerning in my choices of ordering a meal.  This experience will not stop me from returning.

Walked into chili's to be greeted and seated into a booth that we asked and received. Next the waitress was very generous to wait on us since we were taking forever ! She was in top of things and we loved the food! We got an wings as an entree and since I checked in got more food stuff like free chips and cheese! We also ordered their cookie and and ice cream! We just came by for a quick bite and it was delicious ! The place is nice and clean.  We came by because it was convenient and glad it turned it the way it did.  Loved their different stuff they have on the menu now since it's been a while since I've been to chili's!  We will gladly go back especially for Happy hour ! Such god deals Monday-Friday around dinner time

Thank you so much to our wonderful server, Jessie Jane!!! She was super friendly and so so efficient!! She told us about delicious deals and took excellent care of us. We really appreciate your awesome service, Jessie Jane!!! We will be back and we'll leave room for desserts!!! Thank you!!!!!
Always delicious, good service. Yummy food.good location. Fast service. They do birthday celebrations too
Credit to the manager of this location for reaching out after my last review. Hope to hear from him soon about the final word on military discounts at this location.

I come here all the time and the service is usually great but they seem to get the side orders wrong all the time. They either forget to bring it or give the incorrect one. The biggest issue I have is their take out orders. I called ahead to have an order ready by 6:40. Husband got there and they made him wait an extra 40 minutes because his burger wasn't ready. He gets home and realizes that the burger isn't even in the bag! I check the order and confirm it's missing so I double check all the meals. Sides were wrong and the fries were basically a few pieces (5) for two orders. Checked the receipt and they only gave the one without the description, just the total. The manager was nice enough to comp the meal and do everything over. The counter lady was explaining that it was due to the trainees working that night. I get that mistakes happen but a trainee is under the supervision of the trainer right? You're supposed to double check their work. Don't just hold that person responsible. The issue was not reading the screen correctly and placing them in the bag.

Ordered a San Miguel from the menu, not available. Ordered Chips w/salsa, they ran out of salsa. Our burgers came w/out pickles, why?....they ran out. Fries came to our table cold. AND, ordered the Molten Lava, and. waiter came back and told us...sold out! Lol!   Didn't expect this from a Chili's!

First of all, I frequent this restaurant on average 2-3 times a month. I've always had great service and able to overlook small issues and still enjoy the meals. Managers should come to table when something is sent back right? It didn't happen this night, tables were open and no wait to be seated. Even more reason for management and servers to touch tables throughout service right? IDK. Anyways, My wife's steak comes out rare, when ordered medium. Server asked for us to check, and she agrees, ya - that's rare I'm sorry I'll send it back. Meanwhile the entire family finishes meals and steak (small) is nowhere to be found. Plate comes back, steak is over cooked and dried out now and slapped back on the same plate. Taking a rare steak of that size to medium does not take 20 mins. Sorry to bother you, may I ask for a box? We have to go now. No true apology or attempt at service recovery in my opinion when I'm only told the obvious - sorry you have to take your food to go now. Still tipped my server as it wasn't her fault, but not happy with this experience.

My wife made a take out order then sent my son and I to pick it up.  Unfortunately when I brought it home my PREGNANT wife noticed that none of the sauces were included...god help me. She called to complain while I returned to pickup the sauces.  To my surprise the hostess advised me that the Manager Koa wanted to apologize in person. His apology was heartfelt, sincere and very genuine; he also afforded me a few coupons.  The wife called again and said the chicken was over cooked so I got sent back for a 3rd time smh. Koa is a great asset to this location and salvaged this rather inconvenient experience. In this world that is saturated with dining options Chili's can rest assured that my family and I will be returning. Big ups to Koa, mahalo for going out of your way.  Sincerely pregnant ladies husband.

Placed a To-Go order over the phone. I was told it would take 20 minutes. When I got to the restaurant they said they were waiting on my chicken and salad (which was pretty much my entire order). After waiting an additionally 20 minutes (so 40 minutes since I placed my order), I went up the counter to ask why it was taking so long. They said they were finishing up the order and just waiting on the kids order of mandarin oranges. A few minutes later my food was ready. Once I got out to my car, I checked the food and noticed one of the sides was missing. So I went back in and waited longer for them to get the side. The chicken was also slightly burnt. Any time I've gone in and sat down, the food and service has been fine. This was the first time I've placed a To-Go order at this location, and probably the last.

Picture this. 1:03pm, pretty darn empty restaurant, us and one other table in the section we were in. Christmas music playing and the smell of margaritas lingering in the air. I sit down ready to order one of said margies. Greeted by our server who seems to not have been enjoying the Christmas spirit in the air, as she was grouchy looking. Maybe she's worried she'll get a lump of coal next Monday? Regardless, we saw her maybe three times throughout our entire meal. Each time equally as grouchy looking, which matched the level of friendliness. Anyway, my margie arrived (by 1:20pm) and I may be wrong, but I could've sworn there's supposed to be tequila in a margarita. Either there was none or I've become immune to the flavor and smell of it (both are plausible mind you). Overpriced food shows up (by 1:38pm), chicken tenders for me and burger for my beautiful wife. Sadly it was just meh, (the food, not my wife, she's definitely not meh). I make better burgers at home. So, needless to say, this lunch just reaffirms why I don't go to Chili's anymore. Wanted to give them another try since they "revamped" their menu. Yet another throne of lies. Meh food+ meh service + tequila free margarita = this snarky review. Save your money, save your taste buds, save your Christmas spirit. Come to my house instead, at least there's a friendly face cooking good food and tequila in the margaritas. Mele Kalikimaka everyone.

It is close and convenient to anyone who has a high school kid in Mililani.  Still, it is a chain, so it is hard for me to give it incredible reviews.  I want great salads, veggie entries and calorie diet savvy meals.  I don't know how Chili's scores with this.

This is cont. from last review 3rd for 2018 UPDATE to my UPDATE: I am adding back one star for service because the food tonight was meh.  The food... Our queso came out cold and had to be sent back and reheated. My husband's ribs also came out cold. They made a whole new dish and by the time it came back out we were all done with our food and he ended up packing it to go. My bar burgers were on the bland side and rather dry. Now for the service... Our waitress Christine was awesome! She kept up with my family of swillers (the 3 of them can each drink their own pitcher at dinner) making sure we always had a drink. She was very attentive even though it was a busy Saturday night. I really appreciated her upbeat and friendly attitude. The manager Janie made up for all the errors by comping my husband's meal and a dessert. She also came over and let me know that after discussing the call ahead situation with her gm they decided it would only apply to larger parties, so if your a family of 4 or less you can still call ahead for seating. The customer service here is why I will continue to come back. I'm sure Chili's will earn back that 5 star rating.

Food is good, service is crappy. Ordered to go, went to bar where they told me to go, plenty servers by pass me for other people. Been here for 30 minutes, asked 4 people for help but nothing. I maybe one moke with tattoos but sheesh. I not coming back, our family can get food from big city diners!
